channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: The Swift SDK for Android
item.description:
The Swift for Android Examples help demonstrate end‑to‑end application workflows on Android. With the Swift SDK for Android, you can now start porting your Swift packages to Android. The Android workgroup is drafting a vision document, currently under review, for directing future work regarding Swift on Android.

Read more

item.title: TextEdit and the relief of simple software
item.description:
That device pioneered the graphical-user interface, or G. )” That mess derives from the files that we scatter on our desktops, agglomerations of data in formats that read as increasingly arcane and anachronistic: PDFs, JPGs, ZIPs, M4As. That kind of skeuomorphism—the design of a di.

item.title: First shape found that can't pass through itself
item.description:
Home First Shape Found That Can’t Pass Through Itself Comment Save Article Read Later Share Facebook Copied. Comment Save Article Read Later The Platonic solids that have six, eight, 12 and 20 sides can pass through themselves. That means that if you point a cube’s corner upward, you can bore a vertical tunnel that’s big enough for a second cube to pass through.

Read more

item.title: How to make a Smith chart
item.description:
Images of horizontal lines Next, let’s think about horizontal lines in the z plane, lines with constant imaginary part. The image of these lines is either a line or a circle. Since horizontal lines extend past the right half-plane, the image circles extend past the unit circle.

Read more

item.title: Conductor (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer in San Francisco
item.description:
It’s Charlie and Jackson, founders of Conductor. Conductor is used by engineers at YC, Linear, Vercel, Notion, Supabase, and other leading companies, and it’s changing how people work. We’re used by engineers at YC, Linear, Vercel, Notion, Supabase, and many more.

Read more

item.title: Modern Perfect Hashing
item.description:
) have different top four bits. We use that to index into a small table, check that we got the right one instead of a random collision (e. Here's the case for length-24 CSS keywords, where we happened to have exactly 16 candidates and we found a magic giving a perfect (4-bit) value, making it a no-brainer: static const uint8_t strings[] = { 95, 0, 'b', 'o', 'r', 'd', 'e', 'r', '-', 'b', 'l', 'o', 'c', 'k', '-', 's', 't', 'a', 'r', 't', '-', 'w', 'i', 'd', 't', 'h', 40, 0, '-', 'w', 'e', 'b', 'k', 'i', 't', '-', 't', 'e', 'x', 't', '-', 'o',.

item.title: Microsoft Teams will start snitching to your boss when you're not in the office
item.description:
From a boss’ perspective, this would eliminate any of that confusion as to where your team actually is. Maybe don't tell your boss. You must confirm your public display name before commenting Please logout and then login again, you will then be prompted to enter your display name.
